GoFishGameplayWindow

public GoFishGameplayWindow(java.lang.String playerName)
                     throws InvalidArgumentException,
                            NoMoreCardsInDeckException
Constructs a GoFishComputerGame

Parameters:
The - name of the player that will play against the computer. ONLY LETTERS AND NUMBERS!
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - In case an unexpected error occurs
NoMoreCardsInDeckException - In case there are no more cards in the deck

                     throws InvalidArgumentException,
                            NoMoreCardsInDeckException

Parameters:
playerNames - A list of names that will play the game. NO DUPLICATES AND ONLY LETTERS AND DIGITS!
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - In case an unexpected error occurs
NoMoreCardsInDeckException - In case there are no more cards in the deck

findColor

private int findColor(int playerNumber)
Finds a color from the Color modulo the playerNumber - 1 and the size of the COLOR_ARRAY

Parameters:
playerNumber - The player number of a CardPlayer. DO NOT SUBTRACT ONE FROM THIS. This method performs that arithmetic for you.
Returns:
The color in accordance to the COLOR_ARRAY and the Color class

restartGame

private void restartGame()
Restarts the game

sortHand

private java.util.ArrayList<Card> sortHand(java.util.ArrayList<Card> origHand)
Sorts a hand of cards. This does not sort the hand stored in the CardPlayer class. The sorting is done and stored locally.

Parameters:
hand - The hand to sort
Returns:
The sorted copy of the hand
